modName: Theme Music - Khajiit Like to Sneak
summary:

descriptionHtml:
Replaces the main theme music with Gavin Dunn (Miracle of Sounds) awesome song, Khajiit Like to Sneak. Original here - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tqEVCTMkBnI or here - http://www.escapistmagazine.com/videos/view/miracle-of-sound/5498-Khajiit-Like-To-Sneak-Skyrim 

Please, go visit his page, support this awesome musician so he can continue to give us such great songs. :D

To install, drop into your Data folder and say Yes to Merge Folders? and Yes to Overwrite? 

To uninstall, delete /Data/Music/Special/mus_maintheme.xwm . 

Enjoy! Happy thieving fellow Khajiits, leave them cribbing and crying while we continue to sing and dance! :D
author: Lee Lloyd
